sentences.en: He'd had a checkered past in the government.
Her finger traced the checkered pattern of their flannel sheets.
sentences.cn: 她的手指描绘出法兰绒被单上的方格图案.

sentences.en: I want the red checkered shirt starched. And I don't want the light blue shirt starched.
sentences.cn: 这件红格衬衣需要上浆,这件浅蓝色的不需要浆.

sentences.en: In the public's eyes , demographers have a checkered reputation.
sentences.cn: 民众对人口统计学者的评价不一.

sentences.en: Padded drawstring top and matching bottom features flowers in bright colors against a pink checkered setting.
sentences.cn: 加垫拉顶部和底部特征匹配的鲜花鲜艳色彩的粉红色格仔设置.

sentences.en: She wore a checkered jumper and had ribbons in her hair.
sentences.cn: 她穿着格子连衣裙，头上系着丝带。

sentences.en: Superiority and difficulties of developing checkered plates in the CSP process are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了采用CSP工艺技术轧制花纹板的优势及技术难点.

sentences.en: The checkered pattern of that suspender recurred incessantly to his mind.
sentences.cn: 那根背带的棋盘格花纹不停地在他脑子里显现出来.

sentences.en: The grind under the tree is checkered with sunlight and shade.
sentences.cn: 树丛下的地面光影交错.

sentences.en: The ground under the trees was checkered and shade.
sentences.cn: 树林下的地上光影交错.

sentences.en: The ground under the trees was checkered with sunlight and shade.
The historical record is checkered at best.
sentences.cn: 历史的记录充其量是多变的.

sentences.en: The lawn was checkered with sunlight and shade.
sentences.cn: 草坪上光影交错成方格图案.

sentences.en: The network a similarly checkered history.
sentences.cn: 网络有着类似的曲折历史.

sentences.en: The painting's history has been checkered. There are nearly a hundred well - documented copies and versions of the work.
sentences.cn: 这幅画的历史错综复杂,它有将近100幅证据充分的摹本和版本.

words.tran_cn: 检验员；收银员；棋子；方格图案；制止者
检查（check的过去式和过去分词）
把…画成棋盘形方格图案；使多样化
在…上面纵横交错地排列
多变的；有方格的；多波折的

trans.tran_cn: 使（某物）呈现方格图案或不同颜色或不同深浅的方格( checker的过去分词 )
